source:
# 詞性標註(POS Tag)
- Author: Lynn
- Updated: 2021/5/30
## 英文詞性標註

from google.colab import drive
import pandas as pd
drive.mount('/content/gdrive')

text: Mounted at /content/gdrive
outputs.name: stdout

source: ### 下載 NLTK 資料包

import nltk

nltk.download('punkt')
nltk.download('averaged_perceptron_tagger')

text:
[nltk_data] Downloading package punkt to /root/nltk_data...
[nltk_data]   Unzipping tokenizers/punkt.zip.
[nltk_data] Downloading package averaged_perceptron_tagger to
[nltk_data]     /root/nltk_data...
[nltk_data]   Unzipping taggers/averaged_perceptron_tagger.zip.
outputs.name: stdout

source: ### 使用 NLTK 作詞性標註

from nltk import word_tokenize

#sentence = 'Once when I was six years old I saw a magnificent picture in a book, called True Stories from Nature, about the primeval forest.'
#sentence = 'It was a picture of a boa constrictor in the act of swallowing an animal.'
#sentence = 'Here is a copy of the drawing.'
sentence = 'John saw the saw.'

tokens = nltk.word_tokenize(sentence)
print(tokens,'\n')

tagged = nltk.pos_tag(tokens)

import pandas as pd
df = pd.DataFrame(tagged,columns=['token','pos'])
df

text: ['John', 'saw', 'the', 'saw', '.']
outputs.name: stdout

text/html:
token pos
0 John NNP
1 saw VBD
2 the DT
3 saw NN
4 . .
text/plain:
token  pos
0  John  NNP
1   saw  VBD
2   the   DT
3   saw   NN

source: ## 中文詞性標註
### 使用 Jieba 的posseg做詞性標註

import jieba
import jieba.posseg as pseg

# 啟動 paddle 模式。 0.40版之后开始支持，早期版本不支持
jieba.enable_paddle() #划槳: 使其運作較快 支援平行運算 (但會影響結果，尤其是混有標點符號的情況)

#sentence = '土地公有政策，飛越太平洋。'
sentence = '他每天都去運動中心游泳'

# 直接餵入句子(string)
tagged = pseg.lcut(sentence,use_paddle=True) #記得加入 不然白開了
#lcut回傳list
print(type(tagged)) #list

for word,flag in tagged:
  print('%s, %s' % (word,flag))

df = pd.DataFrame(tagged,columns=['token','pos'])
df

text: Paddle enabled successfully......
outputs.name: stderr

text:
他, r
每天, TIME
都, d
去, v
運動中心, LOC
游泳, v
outputs.name: stdout

text/html:
token pos
0 他 r
1 每天 TIME
2 都 d
3 去 v
4 運動中心 LOC
5 游泳 v
text/plain:
token   pos
0     他     r
1    每天  TIME
2     都     d
3     去     v
4  運動中心   LOC
5    游泳     v

# 下載資料包 法2 穩定
import gdown

url = "https://drive.google.com/uc?id=1efHsY16pxK0lBD2gYCgCTnv1Swstq771"
output = "data.zip"
quit = False
gdown.download(url,output,quit)
#(來源,目的, 顯示下載進度與否)

# 解壓縮
!unzip data.zip

Maybe you need to change permission over 'Anyone with the link'?

text: Archive:  data.zip
replace data/embedding_character/token_list.npy? [y]es, [n]o, [A]ll, [N]one, [r]ename:
outputs.name: stdout

source:
from ckiptagger import WS, POS

ws = WS("./data")
pos = POS("./data")

sentence = ['土地公有政策，飛越太平洋。','他每天都去運動中心游泳']
#sentence = ['他每天都去運動中心游泳']

tokens = ws(sentence)
tagged = pos(tokens)

for i,_ in enumerate(tokens[0]):   #_代表因為enumerate會回傳兩個參數，但第2個目前沒用，所以用_
    print('%s, %s' % (tokens[0][i], tagged[0][i]))
               #放分好的詞的第0個第一個字    #tagged放

source: ### 以 Jieba 作詞性標註

# 讀檔
import pandas as pd

csv = '/content/gdrive/MyDrive/AI_&_EdgeComputing_Program/NLP/shared_folder/dataset/techorange_ai.csv'
df = pd.read_csv(csv)

titles = df['title'].apply(str).tolist() #tolist: 將字串(str)轉成串列(list)
contents = df['content'].apply(str).tolist()
#print(df.head())
total_articles = df.shape[0] #取得總共有多少篇 共792
print(f'共{total_articles}篇文章')

# 分詞與詞性標註
from tqdm import tqdm
import jieba
import jieba.posseg as pseg

#jieba.enable_paddle()
#range(total_articles) =0~791 共792種
#tqdm用來產生進度條，記得包在外面
tagged = []
for i in tqdm(range(total_articles)):
    sentence = titles[i] + '。' + contents[i]
    #sentence = titles[i]
    tagged += pseg.lcut(sentence)
    #type(tagged) -> list

text: 0%|          | 0/792 [00:00<?, ?it/s]Building prefix dict from the default dictionary ...
outputs.name: stderr

text: 共792篇文章
outputs.name: stdout

text:
Dumping model to file cache /tmp/jieba.cache
Loading model cost 1.038 seconds.
Prefix dict has been built successfully.
100%|██████████| 792/792 [11:14<00:00,  1.17it/s]
outputs.name: stderr

source:
# 過濾特定詞性
filter = ['n','nr','ns','nt','nz','PER','LOC','ORG']

filtered_tokens = []
for t in tagged:
    if t.flag in filter:  #t.flag詞性   #t.word單詞
        #print('%s, %s' % (t.word, t.flag))
        filtered_tokens.append(t.word)
        #若為需要的指定詞性，則加入filtered_token這個List

print(len(filtered_tokens)) #看詞的list有幾個單詞

# 計算次數(詞頻)
from collections import Counter
ct = Counter(filtered_tokens)
print(ct.most_common())

# 產生文字雲
from wordcloud import WordCloud
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

wc = WordCloud(background_color='white',
               max_words=200,
               font_path='/content/taipei_sans_tc_beta.ttf')
wc.generate_from_frequencies(ct)
plt.imshow(wc)

# 儲存文字雲圖檔
wc.to_file('/content/drive/MyDrive/shared_folder/cloudword_pos.png')
### HW以 CKIPTagger 作詞性標註

csv ='/content/gdrive/MyDrive/AI_&_EdgeComputing_Program/NLP/shared_folder/dataset/techorange_ai.csv'

print('type of df: ',type(df))

print(ws)
print(pos)

sentence = df
print('\n\nsentence type: \n',type(sentence))

######

print('\ntoken: ', tokens)
tagged =pos(tokens)
print('\ntagged : \n ', tagged)

for i,_ in enumerate(tokens[0]):   #_代表因為enumerate會回傳兩個參數，但第2個目前沒用，所以用_
